product_description: Show off your stems in these classic-wash stretch-denim shorts designed with a flattering high waist and feathery frayed hems.
product_details_and_care:
Show off your stems in these classic-wash stretch-denim shorts designed with a flattering high waist and feathery frayed hems.
3 1/2" inseam; 21" leg opening; 12" front rise; 15 1/2" back rise (size 8)
Zip fly with button closure
Front and back patch pockets
72% cotton, 11% modal, 9% elasterell-p, 7% recycled cotton, 1% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
t.b.d.
Item #6065355
product_size_info:
Sizes 0-6 run large; order one size down.
Sizes 8-24; true to size.
High rise.
